text: Michael McKenna (born 4 January 1991) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a midfielder for Arbroath. ==Career== Born in Edinburgh, McKenna spent time in Hibernian's youth academy before joining Musselburgh Athletic in 2012. In the summer of 2014, McKenna signed for Scottish Championship side Livingston on a one-year contract. In summer 2015, McKenna joined Berwick Rangers.
